name: Bombin Blowout
description:
Have you ever felt like you were seconds away from blowing up?

Has a game ever made you so frustrated that you just want to track down all the developers, go to their houses and steal every battery out of every appliance in their home every second week just to inconvenience them in such an insignificant way they will slowly be driven to an absolute boiling point and eventually explode?

Me neither.

In Bombin Blowout, you play as this adorable little bomb just zooming around the screen, but because you’ve been possessed by the spiteful spirit of the stupidest chess piece, the bishop, you can only move in dumb little diagonals. 

Dodge the fire and die.
